price: A među nama ima i dobrih i onih koji to nisu, ima nas vrsta različitih;
arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-annā minnā al-ṣāliḥūna waminnā dūna dhālika kunnā ṭarāiqa qidadan
